versos: (boaz) Ruth 2:1 - "Now Naomi had a kinsman on her husband's side, a prominent rich man, of the family of Elimelech, whose name was boaz.";;;

(reapers) Matthew 13:30 - Let both grow together until the harvest, and at harvest time I will tell the reapers, 'Gather the weeds first and bind them in bundles to be burned, but gather the wheat into my barn.'";;;
(hearest) Romans 10:17 - So then faith cometh by hearing
(measured) Revelation 21:15 - "The one who spoke with me had a gold measuring rod to measure the city, its gates, and its wall.";;;
(confirm) 1 Corinthians 1:6 - "even as the testimony about Christ was confirmed among you";;;

(ephratah) Micah 5:2 - "But thou, Bethlehem ephratah, though thou be little among the thousands of Judah, yet out of thee shall he come forth unto me that is to be ruler in Israel; whose goings forth have been from of old, from everlasting.";;;
(obed) Ecclesiastes 8:2 - "Obey the king's command, I say, because you took an oath before God.";;;
(jesse) Isaiah 11:1 - "A shoot will come up from the stump of jesse; from his roots a Branch will bear fruit.";;;
(ramah) 1 Samuel 7:17 - "Then he would return to ramah, for his home was there, and there too he would judge Israel. And he built there an altar to the Lord.";;;

(tabor) Judges 4:6 - She sent for Barak son of Abinoam from Kedesh in Naphtali and said to him, "The Lord, the God of Israel, commands you: 'Go, take with you ten thousand men of Naphtali and Zebulun and lead them up to Mount tabor.;;;
(salmon) The word "salmon" does not appear in the Bible.;;;
(multiply) Genesis 1:22 - God blessed them and said, "Be fruitful and multiply.";;;
(petition) Philippians 4:6 - "Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.";;;
(enlarged) Psalm 4:1 - "Answer me when I call, O God of my righteousness You have set me at large when I was in distress; Be gracious to me and hear my prayer.";;;
(bows) Psalm 46:9 - "He makes wars cease to the end of the earth; he breaks the bow, and shatters the spear; he burns the shields with fire.";;;

(hungry) Isaiah 58:10 - "and if you spend yourselves in behalf of the hungry and satisfy the needs of the oppressed, then your light will rise in the darkness, and your night will become like the noonday.";;;
